comment: Ordering on reals satisfies strict trichotomy. Axiom 18 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. (This restates ~ ax-pre-lttri with ordering on the extended reals.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
